GIS tools
Good news: you can do all your analysis in .


Recommended tutorials:

Spatial data science with R and terra
Spatial Data Science with application in R (sf and stars)
Spatial Statistics for Data Science: Theory and Practice with R



Other tools:

Google Earth Engine  Good alternative to avoid downloading large data and make use of Google computation power (for academics only)

Quantum GIS  Open source alternative to ArcGIS. Dedicated GIS tool, helpful to create professional maps
